img.alt: APRIL BOARD MEETING WILL BE A VIRTUAL ZOOM MEETING

h3.a: APRIL BOARD MEETING WILL BE A VIRTUAL ZOOM MEETING

div.p: The Iroquois SD Board will hold their scheduled Regular Board meeting on Tuesday, April 21, 2020, at 6:30 PM, on a virtual platform as a result of the COVID-19 crisis.A link to the webinar being...

img.alt: PARTICIPATE IN THE IES BEE BOARD AT HOME

h3.a: PARTICIPATE IN THE IES BEE BOARD AT HOME

div.p: Students & Families, I hope that you remain safe and healthy at home. Over the past school year, Iroquois Elementary has celebrated our students’ positive behavior by acknowledging them when they...
This morning, PA Secretary of Education, Pedro Rivera, issued an order under Act 13 of 2020 to close all public schools through the end of the 2019-2020 academic year, as defined by the local...
Important School Closure Update from PA Secretary of Education. See full details on ISD websites under News.
There will be no lessons from 4/9-4/13. Meal distribution is 4/14 from 11am-1pm and 4/17 from 9-11am at IHS and Wesley UMC.
ISD Board Committee meetings for April 14th have been canceled. All matters will be handled at Full Board Meeting on April 21st.

p.a: Event: Full Board Meeting - Meeting will be virtual
